--- Mitchell Timin <zenguyuno@...> wrote:
> If possible, I don't want to build any game strategy
> into the players.  If I told them which cards were
> worth looking at, that would be game strategy.
> Now If I'm unable to evolve an ANN that can play the
> game, then I might try to be less "pure" and give it
> some help.

What I was describing wouldn't build in any particular
strategy.  It would simply mean that the input to the
ANN would be two board positions each turn, rather
than all of the board positions. 

To keep inputting 000 for every empty space every turn
is an inefficiency (albeit a small one with only a
six-card game...but when the number of cards is
increased, efficiency becomes more important).  

Derek
